alert.note: Alert for Northern Spartanburg; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 5:41PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Spartanburg County through 615 PM EDT... At 541 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles south of Columbus, or near Campobello, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Spartanburg, Boiling Springs SC, Duncan, Lyman, Wellford, Inman, Campobello, Lake Bowen, USC Upstate and GSP Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
